channel.title: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page
channel.description:
ok i got my server online and everything but when i register it on the page the next day it is gone.. ive tryed everything i can think of... Some1 plz help.
~editied~ any1?

item.title: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @ersertaz ersertaz
item.description:
@ersertaz wrote:

ok one dont treat me like im a retard rickyrick and for all you that said “re-add” it y do i need to do it and other servers dont?

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page

item.title: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @rob1601 rob1601
item.description:
@rob1601 wrote:

maybe he disconnects his server and when it has an uptime of 20% it gets removed

for example:

if your server is on for an hour it will get removed when it has not been on for 4 hours i think. It may not be right but i think it gets the point across

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page

item.title: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

after registering server on status page the status percent goes down and when it reaches to around 10-30 its deleted off there so more servers can be registered -.-"

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page

item.title: How to get my server to stay on the Mopar Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @rickyrick rickyrick
item.description:
@rickyrick wrote:

maybe you get a new i.p everyday? havent you noticed everytime you leave the computer off it changes its i.p when its turned on again? DUHHHHH
